metadata.title: NINE20 | AI Made Accessible
metadata.description: Making AI accessible for everyone. Built by NINE20.

hero.title: AI for Everyone,
hero.description: We build services that make powerful AI context from Claude, GPT, Gemini, and more accessible to everyone — no technical expertise required. New AI service every month.

appHub.title: Saju920 Mobile App
appHub.description: We are preparing launch on iOS App Store and Google Play. Until release, you can use the free saju preview on web.
appHub.storeNotice: Store links are temporary placeholders and will be replaced with final app URLs.

features.title: AI Services Built by NINE20
features.description: Making AI accessible for everyone, one new service at a time.

saju920.name: KRFortuneTeller920
saju920.description: Where Eastern philosophy meets AI. Four AI masters analyze your fortune from diverse perspectives.

multiAI.name: Multi-AI Engine
multiAI.description: Leverage Claude, GPT, Gemini and more through a single interface, optimized for each use case.

easyContext.name: Easy Context
easyContext.description: Making powerful AI context intuitive and accessible, even for people without technical backgrounds.

comingSoon.name: Next Service
comingSoon.description: We launch a new AI service every month. Stay tuned for the next product.

techHighlights.title: Tech That Makes AI Easy
techHighlights.description: Building modern technology so anyone can harness the power of AI.

calendar.title: Domain-Specific Engines
calendar.description: Purpose-built engines optimized for each service. KRFortuneTeller920's lunar calendar engine is the first.

timezone.title: Global Service
timezone.description: Korean and English support by default. Services designed to work from anywhere in the world.

ai.title: Multi-AI Architecture
ai.description: Hybrid AI architecture combining GPT, Claude, Gemini and more for each unique use case.

personalization.title: Intuitive UX
personalization.description: Designing intuitive user experiences that unlock powerful AI features without requiring technical knowledge.

footer.description: Making AI accessible for everyone. Built by NINE20.

about.title: About NINE20
about.description: NINE20 is a solo AI startup. We build services that make powerful AI context from Claude, GPT, Gemini, and more accessible to everyone — no technical expertise required.
about.firstProductDescription: KRFortuneTeller920 is a fortune analysis service combining Eastern philosophy with AI. Four AI masters analyze your destiny from diverse perspectives.
about.visionDescription: NINE20's goal is to launch a new AI service every month, making the benefits of AI technology available to everyone.

saju920Terms.description: Core terms for using the Saju920 service.

teaser.description: Enter your birth date and gender to instantly check your basic saju result.

page.description: Check your basic saju information without login.
